title: When is this thing getting fixed?
body: Please Riot, when is  this getting fixed? Its been a week and I wanna play league of legends on my own computer! PLEAAAAASE :( Sick of seeing this "you have been disconnected. Please re-connect your internet and try again" or the Error response to the server! I'm sure many others are in the same boat as I!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you connecting via a wired or wireless connection?
